paper.title: Trustworthy residual vehicle value prediction for auto finance
paper.abstract: The residual value (RV) of a vehicle refers to its estimated worth at some point in the future. It is a core component in every auto finance product, used to determine the credit lines and the leasing rates. As such, an accurate prediction of RV is critical for the auto finance industry, since it can pose a risk of revenue loss by over-prediction or make the financial product incompetent through under-prediction. Although there are a number of prior studies on training machine learning models on a large amount of used car sales data, we had to cope with real-world operational requirements such as compliance with regulations (i.e., monotonicity of output with respect to a subset of features) and generalization to unseen input (i.e., new and rare car models). In this paper, we describe how we addressed these practical challenges and created value for our business at Hyundai Capital Services, the top auto financial service provider in Korea.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用机器学习模型预测车辆的残值，这在汽车金融产品中用于确定信用额度和租赁利率。准确的残值预测对于避免收入损失和保持金融产品竞争力至关重要，这直接关系到金融风险管理中的信用风险和操作风险管理。
